isis.stitle: FRONT STEER AXLE: EATON E1200I I-BEAM - INSPECTION - BUSHING

svcprocinfo.para: Following regular and thorough greasing practices will maximize bushing life.

svcsubproc.title: Upper Bushing Lateral Inspection
svcsubproc.para: This procedure measures upper bushing wear due to side and vertical loading.

step1.para: Mount dial indicator on the axle. Reference the upper part of the steering knuckle ( Figure 4).
Move the tire and wheel assembly in and out with a push/pull motion and have an assistant record the dial indicator reading.
Replace the upper bushing if readings are in excess of 0.015 inch (0.38mm).

svcsubproc.title: Lower Bushing Lateral Inspection
svcsubproc.para: This procedure measures lower bushing wear due to side and vertical loading.

step1.para: Mount dial indicator on the axle. Reference the base of the lower arm on the steering knuckle Figure 5.
Move bottom of tire and wheel assembly in and out with a push/pull motion and have an assistant record dial indicator reading.
Replace the lower bushing if dial indicator readings are in excess of 0.015 inch (0.38mm).

note.para: To avoid inaccurate measurements, be careful not to let the knuckle turn while moving assembly in and out.
Locate indicator on a smooth, flat surface for best readings.
